snippet: As Netflix prepares to start streaming in six European countries next week, some politicians and rival businesses there are assailing the company over issues like competition and taxes.
abstract: Debut of video streaming service Netflix in six European countries is stirring mix of anticipation and anxiety, as European services and cable operators rush efforts to retain viewers.
lead_paragraph: As Netflix prepares to start streaming in six European countries next week, some politicians and rival businesses there are assailing the company over issues like competition and taxes.
